LanguageData.ARA_AcidCoverd.label: Arachnae Acid Fluid
LanguageData.ARA_AcidCoverd.description: An Arachnae bug with an acid sac has sprayed strong acid onto the target. The adhering liquid is painful, softens armor and skin, and continues to burn the body.
LanguageData.ARA_AcidCoverd.stages.0.label: mild
LanguageData.ARA_AcidCoverd.stages.1.label: mild
LanguageData.ARA_AcidCoverd.stages.2.label: moderate
LanguageData.ARA_AcidCoverd.stages.3.label: severe
LanguageData.ARA_AcidCoverd.stages.4.label: extreme
LanguageData.ARA_AcidCoverd.stages.5.label: total
LanguageData.ARA_ToxicBuildup.label: Arachnae Neurotoxin
LanguageData.ARA_ToxicBuildup.description: The neurotoxin from an Arachnae stinger is affecting this colonist. This powerful toxin rapidly incapacitates movement, causes nausea and dizziness, and may sometimes result in permanent brain damage.
LanguageData.ARA_ToxicBuildup.stages.0.label: initial
LanguageData.ARA_ToxicBuildup.stages.1.label: initial
LanguageData.ARA_ToxicBuildup.stages.2.label: mild
LanguageData.ARA_ToxicBuildup.stages.3.label: moderate
LanguageData.ARA_ToxicBuildup.stages.4.label: severe
LanguageData.ARA_ToxicBuildup.stages.5.label: extreme
LanguageData.ARA_SkyhiveBite.label: Skyhive Bug Attachment
LanguageData.ARA_SkyhiveBite.description: A cute Skyhive Arachnae bug has bitten you. The bug will continue to bite until it detaches from your body. It shouldn't be a big problem... probably.
LanguageData.ARA_ReinforceGasCoverd.label: Arachnae Pheromone Adherence
LanguageData.ARA_ReinforceGasCoverd.description: You've come into contact with Arachnae pheromone. Something is approaching from underground.
LanguageData.ARA_Unburnable.label: Fire-Resistant Smoke
LanguageData.ARA_Unburnable.description: This area is covered with special smoke, making colonists inside the smoke resistant to catching fire easily.
LanguageData.ARA_ChainReload.label: Chain Reload
LanguageData.ARA_ChainReload.description: The weapon in use is capable of chain reloading, increasing the reload speed with each shot.
LanguageData.ARA_ChainReload.stages.0.label: Level 1/5
LanguageData.ARA_ChainReload.stages.1.label: Level 2/5
LanguageData.ARA_ChainReload.stages.2.label: Level 3/5
LanguageData.ARA_ChainReload.stages.3.label: Level 4/5
LanguageData.ARA_ChainReload.stages.4.label: Level 5/5
LanguageData.ARA_BeamAiming.label: Beam Preheating
LanguageData.ARA_BeamAiming.description: The Arachnae swarm's beam-type energy weapons can fire continuously after a short period of aiming.
LanguageData.ARA_BeamAiming.stages.0.label: Complete
LanguageData.ARA_Fighter_Execution_Damage.label: Execution
LanguageData.ARA_Fighter_Execution_Damage.description: Deals great damage to execute the target.
LanguageData.ARA_Whip_Hediff.label: Whipping
LanguageData.ARA_Whip_Hediff.description: This colonist has been struck by the soft weapon of an Arachnae bug—it's very painful.
LanguageData.ARA_Hediff_FrostCoverd_after.label: Frost Covered
LanguageData.ARA_Hediff_FrostCoverd_after.description: This individual is covered in an ice-frost cloud and is about to trigger a frost-mist explosion.
LanguageData.ARA_CryoShock.label: Rapid Cooling
LanguageData.ARA_CryoShock.description: The target is in a state of rapid freezing. In this state, the body structure becomes extremely fragile. As the effect progresses, body parts may be directly destroyed by freeze damage.
LanguageData.ARA_Genestealer_ExtractGene_Hediff.label: Forced Extraction
LanguageData.ARA_Genestealer_ExtractGene_Hediff.descr: An Arachnae Genestealer has forcibly extracted a portion of this colonist's genetic sequence. As a result, the colonist can no longer maintain basic physiological activities. This damage is irreversible and will not recover even if the genes are returned.
